plot outline: Dangerous Gangster Marudhu singam(Lal) comes to hunt down a whole family. - When the President learns that domestic terrorists have skyjacked the passenger jet her brother is flying, she must choose between family and the safety of the people in the cities below.
title: Vanmurai
plot: Dangerous Gangster Marudhu singam(Lal) comes to hunt down a whole family. - When the President learns that domestic terrorists have skyjacked the passenger jet her brother is flying, she must choose between family and the safety of the people in the cities below.
